    • Constructor Detail

      • TCPTransportConfig

        public TCPTransportConfig(int port,
                  java.lang.String ipAddress,
                  boolean autoReconnect)
        Constructor. Objects of this class must be created for known port and IP address value.
        Parameters:
        port - Port for TCP connection.
        ipAddress - IP address for TCP connection.
        autoReconnect - Flag which must be set to true if tcp connection must be automatically reestablished in case of disconnection
